owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pay(uint256).details: Make sure to check the msg.sender.

params.amount: Amount owed due to reactive transactions and/or callbacks.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.token: Token address (use address(0) for native token)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

coverDebt().notice: Automatically cover the outstanding debt to the system contract or callback proxy, provided the contract has sufficient funds.

getVmStatus().notice: Check if the contract thinks it is in a VM

manualTrigger().notice: Manually trigger a vault rebalance check (owner only)

pay(uint256).notice: Method called by the system contract and/or proxies when payment is due.

react((uint256,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Main reactive function that processes incoming events
